titleStmt.title: Salmacida spolia A masque. Presented by the King and Queenes Majesties, at White-hall, on Tuesday the 21. day of Ianuary 1639.
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] H[arper] for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the flying Horse neere Yorke house,

notesStmt.note: The years are given according to Lady Day dating (Greg).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the flying Horse neere Yorke house
